activities: Our employees are in many cases EU citizens, and their banking information is transferred to the United States for payroll purposes.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Estonia, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Lithuania, Netherlands, Poland, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: All issues will go through our in-house attorney, and our corporate counsel; however, Broadstone Group agrees to cooperate and comply with the EU data protection authorities (DPAs) and the Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner with regard to unresolved issues.
